UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user account in the system, typically the owner of a workshop.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Auth.

Cliente.title: Cliente
Cliente.description: Represents a customer of a specific workshop.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Cliente entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who owns this client data.

Veiculo.title: Veiculo
Veiculo.description: Represents a vehicle owned by a customer.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Veiculo entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who owns this vehicle data.

clienteId.description: Reference to the client who owns the vehicle.

Orcamento.title: Orcamento
Orcamento.description: Represents a quotation for services and parts for a specific workshop.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Orcamento entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who owns this quote.

OrdemServico.title: OrdemServico
OrdemServico.description: Represents a service order for a vehicle for a specific workshop.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who owns this service order.

Peca.title: Peca
Peca.description: Represents a part in a workshop's inventory.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who owns this part.

Servico.title: Servico
Servico.description: Represents a service offered by a workshop.

userId.description: The ID of the user (workshop owner) who offers this service.

firestore.reasoning: The data model is designed for a multi-tenant SaaS application where each user (a workshop) owns their data. All primary data collections (clientes, orcamentos, ordensServico, pecas, servicos) are at the top level. Every document in these collections MUST contain a 'userId' field that links it to the owner in the '/users' collection. This structure allows for simple, scalable, and secure ownership-based security rules. For example, a rule on '/clientes/{clienteId}' will be `allow read, write: if request.auth.uid == resource.data.userId;`. This prevents any user from accessing another user's data. The 'veiculos' collection is a subcollection of 'clientes' as a vehicle is intrinsically linked to a single client.
